original_text: And it was told the house of David, saying, Syria is confederate with Ephraim. And his heart was moved, and the heart of his people, as the trees of the wood are moved with the wind.
korean_text: 어떤 사람이 다윗의 집에 알려 이르되 아람이 에브라임과 동맹하였다 하였으므로 왕의 마음과 그의 백성의 마음이 숲이 바람에 흔들림 같이 흔들렸더라

sentences.original_text: And it was told the house of David
saying, Syria is confederate with Ephraim
and the heart of his people
as the trees of the wood are moved with the wind
